markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 456 <sup>2.0</sup>

Fear effects evoke the emotion of fear. Effects with this trait always have the mental and emotion traits as well.
name: Fear
